channel.title: PI Whip Help

item.title: PI Whip Help
item.dc:creator: @Nathan8888 Nathan8888
item.description:
@Nathan8888 wrote:

Alright this is what i got for my colored whip but it doesnt change colors

if(i == 15441) { itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.originalModelColors = new int[1]; itemDef.modifiedModelColors = new int[1]; itemDef.originalModelColors[0] = 944; itemDef.modifiedModelColors[0] = 8128; itemDef.modelID = 5412; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 5409; itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 5409; itemDef.modelZoom = 840; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 280; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -2; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 0; itemDef.name = "Abyssal Whip (Green)"; itemDef.description = "An abyssal whip colored green.".getBytes(); }
could somone help me with what i did wrong? Thanks

Read full topic
